episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_0:
Hey, Maylene? Are you sure this is the spot you
heard Chef Siebold would be?

Yep! My sources tell me he’s a legendary chef
who’s looking for an assistant on Pasio...and my
sources don’t lie!

All right, then! Let’s go find him!
He should be around here somewhere...
You know, you really are amazing, Rosa!

The fact that you thought of throwing a party
for all your teammates and you want to give
everyone a home-cooked meal...

and you want to go study under a top-notch chef
so that everything’s perfect... I mean, you’re really
going the extra mile!

Y-you think so? I just figured that if I was gonna
cook for everyone, I should make something tasty.

And that’s what’s so amazing about you! Let me
know if there’s anything you need help with, OK?
episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_1:
Thanks, Maylene! I know I can always count
on you.

Anytime! I’m bummed we haven’t run into
Siebold yet, though...
Hey... Did you just say Siebold?

Oh, hello! You wouldn’t happen to know where
we could find him, would you?

I believe he should be just up ahead...
But tell me, do you seek to train under Siebold as
an apprentice as well?

Apprentice... If you’re talking about the
assistant chef position, then yes!

Hmph... That changes things. I am afraid this is
the end of the road for you.
Huh?! What’s that supposed to mean?

Many hopeful applicants, myself included, have
traveled here today for the chance to learn the
techniques of a legendary chef.

However, I heard that Siebold only wishes to take
on a single apprentice... Therefore, I must kick
my rivals out of the running here and now.
episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_2:
No way... I’m not gonna give up and go home
before I’ve even had the chance to meet Chef
Siebold in person!

Errgh! Then you leave me no choice... The path to
becoming a master chef is a brutal one. Leave
now, or I will strike hard and without mercy!

Come on, Rosa, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s take him on!
We can’t let bullies like him go unchecked!

Besides, I’m a martial artist myself! It would be
dishonorable to run away from a challenge!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_0:
A-actually, um, I’m here to apply to be your
assistant chef, Siebold!

Ah, I see. I didn’t realize you were a candidate.
Well then, I have one question for you...

I’ve asked this question to everyone who has
applied for the position so far, and that is...
why do you wish to work with me?

Well... This is something I want to do for
my friends.

Yep! Rosa’s throwing a party for her friends,
and she wants to serve everyone delicious
home-cooked food.

That’s why I want to be your assistant chef—
so I can learn to cook something fantastic!

What delightful ambition! I can tell you have a
knack for service and hospitality.
episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_1: Does that mean you’ll take her on?!

Well, she’s passed the interview portion of the
application, but now I’d like to see what she’s
capable of in action.

In action... You mean you want me to show you
what cooking skills I already have?

No, no. I’d like to see your Pokémon battling skills
in action!

Huh? A Pokémon battle?! What does Pokémon
battling have to do with cooking?

Everything! The two may seem different on the
surface, but deep down both are forms of art
that share the same philosophy.

The end results only last for a few brief, passing
moments, so we devote ourselves to making those
moments last in our memories forever.

So your theory is...if you watch me battle, you’ll
understand my philosophy on cooking, too?

Precisely. Now, the final question is...
will you indulge my curiosity?

To be honest, I’m still pretty confused about all
of this, but I’ll give it a shot!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_2:
I guess my philosophy is...to always put my heart
and soul into every battle. I’ll do my best!

I’d expect nothing less! Now, prove it to me
in action!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_0:
What a delectable battle. Well done!
Your love and passion shined through each
and every move.

You’re hired! I’d be delighted to have you on
as an assistant chef, Rosa.
Really?! This is so amazing! Thank you so much!

The pleasure is all mine. Now, shall we go ahead
and start prepping for—

Hey there! I heard you’re in need of a
talented cook!

Mallow here, at your service! I came to apply for
the open assistant chef position!

Ah, another candidate! My deepest apologies,
but the position has already been filled.
episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_1:
What?! You already hired someone?!
Aw, darn... I was really hoping I’d get the
chance to train under a legendary chef...

Thank you for coming out, but I’m afraid there’s
nothing I can do.
W-wait a sec! I came all this way...

Could we at least have a battle? You could do
that for me, couldn’t you? I’m not asking much!

Wow, you really won’t take no for an answer,
will you?

I just want to see if my skills are good enough to
get the stamp of approval from a legendary chef!
C’mon, pleeease?

I sense you have a very frank, forthright passion
for your craft... It would be wrong of me to
simply turn you away.
I accept. What sort of battle do you propose?

I want a Pokémon battle and a cooking battle...
Er...cook-off? Yeah, a cook-off! And I’m gonna
go all out for both!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_2:
All right. If you want to prove yourself that
badly, then Rosa and I have no choice but to
accept your challenge with utmost hospitality.

In fact, I had a few uniforms imported to Pasio
in case a situation like this were to arise!
Rosa, could you fetch them for me, please?

Let’s put them on and give Mallow here the
full-service Pokémon battle she deserves!
All right. I’m ready when you are!
Time to serve up a Super Mallow Special!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_0:
Wow, this uniform’s a little...flashier than
I expected.
And where’d this Delibird come from?

Huh. It must be a stowaway from the parcel our
uniforms were sent in. I’m not sure how it got
here...but it may be just what we need.

Hospitality is the most important quality of any
good chef, and if there’s any Pokémon that knows
the true meaning of hospitality, it’s Delibird.

If you spend some quality time with Delibird,
its kind, charitable nature may rub off on you.
It can help you grow as a chef!

Octillery has opened my eyes to a whole new
realm of culinary possibility since we first met...
Perhaps it will be the same for you.

The true meaning of hospitality, huh...
All right! Delibird and I are gonna be
best friends in no time!

Phew! You really crushed it in that battle back
there. If your team were a meal, it would be
a pretty tasty one!

Speaking of which, can we move on to our next
battle now? Er—I mean cook-off! I’ll go prepare
my dish first!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_1:
So? What do you think of my dish?! I call it the
special Z-Set! Olivia and Hau are huge fans of it
back in Alola.

I, uh... Um... It’s a little...different than what I
was expecting.

Y-you don’t say... I can tell Mallow really put
her heart into it. What else is there to say
except...mmmm!

Yes. It’s certainly an acquired taste...
I taste intense creativity—a flavor that
immediately gets my brain buzzing.

*gasp*
Goodness gracious! I just thought of a new recipe!
I need to begin prepping right away.

No, wait! I lack the ingredients to fully execute
it right now. First, I’ll have to gather everything
I need.

Are you gonna go shopping for ingredients now?
That sounds like it could take a while.

Why don’t I cook up another dish in the meantime?
It’d be my pleasure!
What? Oh, no... You’re too kind.

Uhhh... I’m gonna go help Siebold with the
shopping! I am his assistant chef, after all.
See you later!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_2: W-wait! I can help you, too!

Would you mind staying back to help Mallow,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? We’ll be right back!

C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s get cooking! I’m feeling a
Super Mallow Special coming on!
We’ll leave you two to it, then! Thanks!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_1001_0:
Phew! That cook-off definitely took a turn
I wasn’t expecting...

That battle was really something else, though!
I feel like it sparked a new passion for cooking
in me!

I’m gonna keep working hard and learn whatever
I can from Siebold. This party’s gonna rock your
socks off. I promise!

Here! I’ve got a little surprise for you as thanks
for helping me out today!
episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_0401_0:
Tee-hee! You’re welcome!
I was afraid you wouldn’t like it.
episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_0402_1: Tee-hee! I’ve been keeping it a secret.
episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_1001_1:
It’s thanks to you that I was able to become
Siebold’s assistant chef and sync up with such
an adorable new partner.

This is just my way of letting you know how
superduper grateful I am!

So thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I hope you have tons of fun at my party, too!
